description: Mobile-first dashboard for the football GM simulation game. Main hub after career creation where users manage their team. Features a bottom tab bar navigation with 5 tabs (Home, Roster, Schedule, Draft, Settings) and displays key information about the user's team and career progress.
goal: Create an engaging, information-rich dashboard that serves as the central hub for all GM activities, providing quick access to team status, upcoming games, and core management features while maintaining the mobile-first design language.
requirements: Bottom tab bar with 5 functional tabs: Home, Roster, Schedule, Draft, Settings
Home tab displays team card, upcoming game preview, and quick stats
Tab navigation updates URL and renders correct content
Maintain selected team and persona data from career store
Mobile-first responsive design matching existing app aesthetic
Each tab has its own dedicated content area
constraints: Must work with existing Zustand career store
No external API calls - all data is local/generated
Use existing shadcn/ui components and Tailwind styles
Tabs other than Home can be placeholder/mock for now
